channel.title: How do i get the srl include? and a small guide aswell please?
channel.description:
i cant egt the srl include its really annouying me.
im kinda new to alot of this and would really appreciate somone helping me...
ive looked on the SCAR downlaods section but cant find it.
help please
ty

item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

rofl did you not read any of this thread. i have been with mopar since the beginning and was at kaitnieks for a month or more. lol im anything but new to the scar community. i meant i signed up for SRL 3 weeks ago (not moparisthebest). hey but thanks for being nice at least and welcoming a new member(at least you thought you were lol). no but really it is good to have people bein nice to noob members. but next time read the whole thread

item.dc:creator: @Taylor Taylor
item.description:
@Taylor wrote:

[quote=“mjordan, post:6, topic:4450”]and this is what i got

mjordan, you do not have permission to access this page. This could be due to one of several reasons:

  1. Your user account may not have sufficient privileges to access this page. Are you trying to edit someone else’s post, access administrative features or some other privileged system?
  2. If you are trying to post, the administrator may have disabled your account, or it may be awaiting activation.

so what do i do now???[/quote]just wait if you registered recently.
